sentences.en: A method using adaptive digital filtering for improving weighting precision was presented.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种用自适应数字滤波来提高称重精度的方法.

sentences.en: A new BO - TMA method combined adaptive weighting with Kalman filter is proposed.
sentences.cn: 提出一种自适应加权和卡尔曼滤波相结合的BO -TMA 新方法.

sentences.en: At the same time, confirm the weighting coefficient by the statistical method.
sentences.cn: 同时在权重确定问题上,利用统计方法,解决了目前过多的利用专家经验的问题.

sentences.en: Based on the neutron energy, the value of weighting factor was given.
sentences.cn: 根据中子能量给出了相应的辐射权重因子的数值.

sentences.en: CONCLUSION: Integrated weighting method can be used to evaluate pharmaceutical research performance.
sentences.cn: 结论: 积分加权法可用于药剂科科研绩效的量化评价.

sentences.en: Each of the factors is given a weighting on a scale of 1 to 10.
sentences.cn: 每种因素按1至10之间的数值加权。

sentences.en: I get an extra £2,700-a-year London weighting.
sentences.cn: 我每年得到2,700英镑的伦敦地区额外津贴。

sentences.en: Most therefore had an above - average weighting of shares in their portfolios.
sentences.cn: 因此在他们大多数人的投资组合中,股票数量高于平均数.

sentences.en: One way to construct this line is by least square, weighting all points equally.
sentences.cn: 办法之一是给予所有的点子以相等的权用最小二乘方法来画这条线.
2.4万英镑工资，外加2,400英镑伦敦生活补贴

sentences.en: The level of weighting rate has direct influence upon the fabric properties.
sentences.cn: 但是,增重率的高低对织物性能有直接影响.

sentences.en: The spring constant is replaced by the weighting function.
sentences.cn: 弹簧常数用权重函数代替.

sentences.en: The stock index's weighting for the total equity of listed companies.
sentences.cn: 该股票指数的权数为上市公司的总股本.

sentences.en: They got a London weighting allowance of ￡200 a year.
sentences.cn: 他们每年获得200英镑伦敦地区差别工资津贴.

sentences.en: They got a London weighting of ￡600 a year.
sentences.cn: 他们每年有六百镑的伦敦地区生活补贴.

sentences.en: Weighting Weeding and watering are not needed during that time but.
sentences.cn: 在该段事件除草和浇水都是不需要的.

words.tran_cn: [数] 加权的；加重的；衡量过的
重量，重力；负担；砝码；重要性
称量（weigh的现在分词形式）；考虑斟酌
加重量于…；重压（weight的过去分词）
重量为…；具有重要性；成为…的重荷；起锚
加重，加权；衡量；（英）生活补贴

trans.tran_cn: （发放给在生活费用高的地区工作的人的）额外津贴，生活补贴，加权值
trans.tran_en: additional money that you get paid because of the high cost of living in a particular area
